name: OTHER PARTY HAS REVIEWED AND APPROVED: (JOINT SOLICITOR)
body:
Applicant 1: ((applicant name))
Applicant 2: ((respondent name))
Case number: ((reference number))

Dear ((solicitor name))

The other ((isApplicant2Represented??applicant's solicitor))((isApplicant2Citizen??applicant)) has reviewed this joint application and approved it. It can now be submitted. 

You need to check the other applicant's answers, then sign and submit:((signin url)) 

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email
subject: Joint ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)): other applicant has approved
